column5: Haters will always hate. Still funny
As a pens fan, pittsburgh has been flat out embarrassing for several different reasons in this year's playoffs.
Wonder how many will be holding up that picture tonight.LOL
That's funny,watch tonight if Pitts is behind going into the third,I think the worst is yet to come.
Ouch.  Wonder if the sleeping lion will wake up?

Would have loved to have been in the Pens locker room before the game. I'll bet Mario ripped them a good one and then challenged them to start acting like pros. Long way to go to get this back to a series, and I don't think the Pens will come back, but, would love to have been in that locker room.
I'm not a Pens fan.... but you're absolutely right. Pathetic on many accounts.
